courses.title: Cooking Basics for Beginners
courses.description: Learn fundamental cooking techniques, knife skills, and simple recipes to get started in the kitchen.

courses.title: Mastering Essential Cooking Techniques
courses.description: Develop professional-level skills in sautéing, roasting, grilling, and more.

courses.title: Healthy Cooking and Meal Planning
courses.description: Learn how to prepare nutritious meals that fit your lifestyle.

courses.title: International Cuisine: Cooking Around the World
courses.description: Explore and cook dishes from different cultures, from Italian pasta to Japanese sushi.

courses.title: Advanced Culinary Skills: Cooking Like a Chef
courses.description: Take your cooking to the next level with gourmet techniques and plating skills.
